example.code:
$newCert = New-Object -TypeName Amazon.ElasticLoadBalancingV2.Model.Certificate
$newCert.CertificateArn = 'arn:aws:acm:us-east-1:123456789012:certificate/19478bd5-491d-47d4-b1d7-5217feba1d97'
Add-ELB2ListenerCertificate -ListenerArn 'arn:aws:elasticloadbalancing:us-east-1:123456789012:listener/app/test-alb/3651b4394dd9a24f/3873f123b98f7618' -Certificate $newCert -Region us-east-1
CertificateArn IsDefault -------------- --------- arn:aws:acm:us-east-1:123456789012:certificate/19478bd5-491d-47d4-b1d7-5217feba1d97 False
example.description: This example adds additional certificate to the specified Listener.
